column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////For my main course
column2: I ordered the bone in filet mignon
column3: priced at $68.95. I had a tough time deciding between that
column5: and the 22oz dry aged bone in ribeye. The waiter told me that the 16 oz bone in filet would give me a few ounces more than the 10 oz traditional filet
column6: since the bone only weighs a couple of ounces
column7: so that's what I went with. I was starving and convinced.
